00039 /**
00040  * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00041  * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00042  * @return SelfDoc
00043  */
00044 SelfDoc CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::explainSelf()
00045 {
00046     SelfDoc doc;
00047     doc.setDocName(CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::getType());
00048     doc.setDocDescription(CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::getDescription());
00049     doc.setDocOptions(CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::getDefaultDocOptions());
00050     return doc;
00051 }
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00055  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00056  */
00057 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::getDefaultDocOptions()
00058 {
00059   std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00060 
00061   SelfDoc::Opt validityThreshold = {"role-validity-threshold", SelfDoc::Opt::Float, "1000.0", "1000.0", "0", "NA", " Paternity Role Validity Threshold"};
00062   opts.push_back(validityThreshold);
00063 
00064   SelfDoc::Opt errorRate = {"error-rate", SelfDoc::Opt::Float, "0.01", "0.01", "0.0", "1.0", " Paternity Error Rate"};
00065   opts.push_back(errorRate);
00066 
00067   return opts;
00068 }

00070 /**
00071  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00072  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00073  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00074  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00075  *
00076  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00077  *
00078  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00079  */
00080 SelfCreate* CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00081 {
00082     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00083     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00084     CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD* pMethod = new CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD();
00085     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00086     pMethod->m_fRoleValidityThreshold = setupFloatParameter("role-validity-threshold", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00087     pMethod->m_fErrorRate = setupFloatParameter("error-rate", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00088     pMethod->setDocName(getType());
00089     pMethod->setDocDescription(getDescription());
00090     // specify Calvin groups and datasets this analysis needs to read from cychp file
00091     pMethod->addGroupDataset("ProbeSets", "CopyNumber");
00092     pMethod->addGroupDataset("AlgorithmData", "MarkerABSignal");
00093     pMethod->addGroupDataset("Genotyping", "Calls");
00094     return pMethod;
00095 }

00097 /**
00098  * @brief Constructor
00099  */
00100 CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD()
00101 {
00102     m_fRoleValidityThreshold = 0.0;
00103     m_fErrorRate = 0.0;
00104     m_strAlleleFrequencyFileName = "";
00105 }

00107 bool CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::readFile(const AffxString& strFileName) {
00108   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00109   tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
00110   tsv.setAbortOnError(false);
00111   
00112   m_vAlleleFrequencies.reserve(affx::TsvFile::getLineCountInFile(strFileName, false));
00113 
00114   if ( tsv.openTable(strFileName) != affx::TSV_OK ) {
00115     return false;
00116   }
00117   std::string strSnpId;
00118   std::string strAAllele;
00119   std::string strBAllele;
00120   
00121   while (tsv.nextLevel(0)==affx::TSV_OK) {
00122     if( tsv.getColumnCount(0) == 3 ) {
00123       tsv.get(0,0,strSnpId);
00124       tsv.get(0,1,strAAllele);
00125       tsv.get(0,2,strBAllele);
00126       AlleleFrequency* p = new AlleleFrequency;
00127       p->SNPID = strSnpId;
00128       p->AAlleleFrequency = AffxByteArray(strAAllele).parseDouble();
00129       p->BAlleleFrequency = AffxByteArray(strBAllele).parseDouble();
00130       Verbose::out(4, std::string("strSnpId, strAAllele, strBAllele: ") + strSnpId + ", " +  strAAllele + ", " + strBAllele);
00131       m_vAlleleFrequencies.push_back(p);
00132     }
00133   }
00134   tsv.clear();
00135   std::sort(m_vAlleleFrequencies.begin(), m_vAlleleFrequencies.end(), AlleleFreqComp());
00136 
00137   return true;
00138 }

00140 bool CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::genotypeCallsAvailable(CNCychp& cychp)
00141 {
00142     // Elaborate as needed for future array types
00143     return cychp.getCychpHeader().getArrayType() != "Cytogenetics_Array";
00144 }

00146 /**
00147  * @brief Run the analysis.
00148  */
00149 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::run()
00150 {
00151     Verbose::out(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::run(...) start");
00152     Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::run(...) ", 5, 1, 5);
00153     CNCychp& cychpIndex  = getCychpIndex();
00154     CNCychp& cychpMother = getCychpMother();
00155     CNCychp& cychpFather = getCychpFather();
00156 
00157     if (!readFile(m_strAlleleFrequencyFileName))
00158     {
00159         Err::errAbort("Cannot open allele frequency file: " + m_strAlleleFrequencyFileName);
00160     }
00161     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00162 
00163     const bool motherPresent = cychpMother.getFileName() != "";
00164     const bool fatherPresent = cychpFather.getFileName() != "";
00165 
00166     bool useGenotypeCalls = genotypeCallsAvailable(cychpIndex);
00167     //bool useGenotypeCalls = true;
00168     double errorRate;
00169 
00170     std::vector<char> vIndexGenotypeCalls;
00171     std::vector<char> vMotherGenotypeCalls;
00172     std::vector<char> vFatherGenotypeCalls;
00173     std::vector<float> vAAlleleFrequencies;
00174     std::vector<float> vBAlleleFrequencies;
00175     std::vector<unsigned char> vChromosomes;
00176 
00177     std::vector<char> vIndexAllGenotypeCalls;
00178     std::vector<char> vMotherAllGenotypeCalls;
00179     std::vector<char> vFatherAllGenotypeCalls;
00180     std::vector<unsigned char> vAllChromosomes;
00181 
00182     if (!useGenotypeCalls)
00183     {
00184         // Calls not available - try to deduce them from SCAR distributions
00185         std::vector<double> vIndexSCAR;
00186         std::vector<double> vMotherSCAR;
00187         std::vector<double> vFatherSCAR;
00188         for (int iMarkerIndex = 0; (iMarkerIndex < cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount()); iMarkerIndex++)
00189         {
00190             CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pMarker = cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex);
00191             AlleleFrequency objSearch;
00192             objSearch.SNPID = pMarker->getProbeSetName();
00193             aIterPair_t range = std::equal_range(m_vAlleleFrequencies.begin(), m_vAlleleFrequencies.end(), &objSearch, AlleleFreqComp());
00194             if (range.first != range.second)
00195             {
00196                 vIndexSCAR.push_back(pMarker->getSCAR());
00197                 if (motherPresent)
00198                 {
00199                     vMotherSCAR.push_back(cychpMother.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getSCAR());
00200                 }
00201                 if (fatherPresent)
00202                 {
00203                     vFatherSCAR.push_back(cychpFather.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getSCAR());
00204                 }
00205                 vAAlleleFrequencies.push_back((*range.first)->AAlleleFrequency);
00206                 vBAlleleFrequencies.push_back((*range.first)->BAlleleFrequency);
00207                 vChromosomes.push_back(pMarker->getChromosome());
00208             }
00209         }
00210         int iSCARCount = vIndexSCAR.size();
00211         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00212 
00213         CPrimeEM indexEM;
00214         CPrimeEM motherEM;
00215         CPrimeEM fatherEM;
00216 
00217         // 3 component mixture model fit to the SCAR data
00218         fit3CompModel(indexEM, vIndexSCAR);
00219         vIndexSCAR.clear();
00220         std::vector<double>().swap(vIndexSCAR);
00221 
00222         if (motherPresent)
00223         {
00224             fit3CompModel(motherEM, vMotherSCAR);
00225             vMotherSCAR.clear();
00226             std::vector<double>().swap(vMotherSCAR);
00227         }
00228         if (fatherPresent)
00229         {
00230             fit3CompModel(fatherEM, vFatherSCAR);
00231             vFatherSCAR.clear();
00232             std::vector<double>().swap(vFatherSCAR);
00233         }
00234 
00235         int gLen = indexEM.getEMEstimates()->m_class.size();
00236         for (int iSnpIndex = 0; iSnpIndex < gLen; iSnpIndex++)
00237         {
00238             vIndexGenotypeCalls.push_back(indexEM.getEMEstimates()->m_class[iSnpIndex]);
00239             if (motherPresent)
00240             {
00241                 vMotherGenotypeCalls.push_back(motherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_class[iSnpIndex]);
00242             }
00243             if (fatherPresent)
00244             {
00245                 vFatherGenotypeCalls.push_back(fatherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_class[iSnpIndex]);
00246             }
00247         }
00248         errorRate = estMaxErrorRate(indexEM, motherEM, fatherEM);
00249     }
00250     else {
00251         // Genotype calls available - use them
00252         for (int iMarkerIndex = 0; iMarkerIndex < cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getCount(); iMarkerIndex++)
00253         {
00254             CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pMarker = cychpIndex.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex);
00255             if (!pMarker->getIsGenotypeCallSet())
00256             {
00257                 continue;
00258             }
00259             vIndexAllGenotypeCalls.push_back(pMarker->getGenotypeCall());
00260             if (motherPresent)
00261             {
00262                 vMotherAllGenotypeCalls.push_back(cychpMother.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getGenotypeCall());
00263             }
00264             if (fatherPresent)
00265             {
00266                 vFatherAllGenotypeCalls.push_back(cychpFather.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getGenotypeCall());
00267             }
00268             vAllChromosomes.push_back(pMarker->getChromosome());
00269 
00270             AlleleFrequency objSearch;
00271             objSearch.SNPID = pMarker->getProbeSetName();
00272             aIterPair_t range = std::equal_range(m_vAlleleFrequencies.begin(), m_vAlleleFrequencies.end(), &objSearch, AlleleFreqComp());
00273             if (range.first != range.second)
00274             {
00275                 vIndexGenotypeCalls.push_back(pMarker->getGenotypeCall());
00276                 if (motherPresent)
00277                 {
00278                     vMotherGenotypeCalls.push_back(cychpMother.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getGenotypeCall());
00279                 }
00280                 if (fatherPresent)
00281                 {
00282                     vFatherGenotypeCalls.push_back(cychpFather.getCychpProbeSetsCopyNumbers().getAt(iMarkerIndex)->getGenotypeCall());
00283                 }
00284                 vAAlleleFrequencies.push_back((*range.first)->AAlleleFrequency);
00285                 vBAlleleFrequencies.push_back((*range.first)->BAlleleFrequency);
00286                 vChromosomes.push_back(pMarker->getChromosome());
00287             }
00288         }
00289         errorRate = m_fErrorRate;
00290     }
00291 
00292     std::for_each(m_vAlleleFrequencies.begin(), m_vAlleleFrequencies.end(), DeleteAlleleFreq());
00293     Verbose::progressStep(1);
00294     CytogeneticsTrioAnalysis objTrioAnalysis;
00295     unsigned char ucMotherCall    = 0;
00296     unsigned char ucFatherCall    = 0;
00297     unsigned char ucFatherDuoCall = 0;
00298     double dFatherConfidence    = 0;
00299     double dMotherConfidence    = 0;
00300     double dFatherDuoConfidence = 0;
00301 
00302     if (motherPresent && fatherPresent)
00303     {
00304         dMotherConfidence    = objTrioAnalysis.calculateLODPaternity(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vMotherGenotypeCalls, vAAlleleFrequencies, vBAlleleFrequencies, errorRate);
00305         dFatherConfidence    = objTrioAnalysis.calculateLODPaternity(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vMotherGenotypeCalls, vFatherGenotypeCalls, vAAlleleFrequencies, vBAlleleFrequencies, errorRate);
00306         dFatherDuoConfidence = objTrioAnalysis.calculateLODPaternity(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vFatherGenotypeCalls, vAAlleleFrequencies, vBAlleleFrequencies, errorRate);
00307         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00308         if (dMotherConfidence    > m_fRoleValidityThreshold) {ucMotherCall    = (unsigned char)1;}
00309         if (dFatherConfidence    > m_fRoleValidityThreshold) {ucFatherCall    = (unsigned char)1;}
00310         if (dFatherDuoConfidence > m_fRoleValidityThreshold) {ucFatherDuoCall = (unsigned char)1;}
00311     }
00312     else if (motherPresent)
00313     {
00314         dMotherConfidence = objTrioAnalysis.calculateLODPaternity(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vMotherGenotypeCalls, vAAlleleFrequencies, vBAlleleFrequencies, errorRate);
00315         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00316         if (dMotherConfidence > m_fRoleValidityThreshold) {ucMotherCall = (unsigned char)1;}
00317     }
00318     else if (fatherPresent)
00319     {
00320         dFatherDuoConfidence = objTrioAnalysis.calculateLODPaternity(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vFatherGenotypeCalls, vAAlleleFrequencies, vBAlleleFrequencies, errorRate);
00321         Verbose::progressStep(1);
00322         if (dFatherDuoConfidence > m_fRoleValidityThreshold) {ucFatherDuoCall = (unsigned char)1;}
00323     }
00324     cychpIndex.setFamilialCall((unsigned char)1);
00325     cychpIndex.setFamilialConfidence((float)1);
00326 
00327     cychpMother.setFamilialCall(ucMotherCall);
00328     cychpMother.setFamilialConfidence((float)dMotherConfidence);
00329 
00330     cychpFather.setFamilialCall(ucFatherCall);
00331     cychpFather.setFamilialConfidence((float)dFatherConfidence);
00332 
00333     cychpFather.setFamilialDuoCall(ucFatherDuoCall);
00334     cychpFather.setFamilialDuoConfidence((float)dFatherDuoConfidence);
00335 
00336     // Mendelian inheritance errors
00337     if (useGenotypeCalls)
00338     {
00339         countMIE(vIndexAllGenotypeCalls, vMotherAllGenotypeCalls, vFatherAllGenotypeCalls, vAllChromosomes);
00340     }
00341     else {
00342         countMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls, vMotherGenotypeCalls, vFatherGenotypeCalls, vChromosomes);
00343     }
00344 
00345     Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00346     Verbose::out(1, "CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::run(...) end");
00347 }
00348 
00349 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::fit3CompModel(CPrimeEM& em, const std::vector<double>& vSCAR)
00350 {
00351     CEMSeed seed;
00352     setSeed(seed);
00353     em.setData(vSCAR);
00354     em.setThreshold(1.1);    // force no -1 calls
00355     em.EMEstimate(seed);
00356 }
00357 
00358 double CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::estMaxErrorRate(CPrimeEM& indexEM,
00359                                                    CPrimeEM& motherEM,
00360                                                    CPrimeEM& fatherEM)
00361 {
00362     std::vector<double> errorRates;
00363     errorRates.push_back(estErrorRate(indexEM.getEMEstimates()->m_mu, indexEM.getEMEstimates()->m_sigma));
00364     if (getCychpMother().getFileName() != "")
00365     {
00366         errorRates.push_back(estErrorRate(motherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_mu, motherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_sigma));
00367     }
00368     if (getCychpFather().getFileName() != "")
00369     {
00370         errorRates.push_back(estErrorRate(fatherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_mu, fatherEM.getEMEstimates()->m_sigma));
00371     }
00372     return *std::max_element(errorRates.begin(), errorRates.end());
00373 }
00374 
00375 double CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::estErrorRate(const std::vector<double>& mean, const std::vector<double>& sigma)
00376 {
00377     const double sqrt2 = 1.414213562373;
00378 
00379     double intersect1 = findIntersections(mean[1], mean[2], sigma[1], sigma[2]).first;
00380     double intersect2 = findIntersections(mean[1], mean[0], sigma[1], sigma[0]).second;
00381 
00382     double erfArg1 = (intersect1 - mean[2])/(sigma[2]*sqrt2);
00383     double erfArg2 = (intersect2 - mean[0])/(sigma[0]*sqrt2);
00384 
00385     double errorRate1 = 0.5 + 0.5*affxstat::erf(erfArg1);
00386     double errorRate2 = 0.5 - 0.5*affxstat::erf(erfArg2);
00387 
00388     return errorRate1 > errorRate2 ? errorRate1 : errorRate2;
00389 }
00390 
00391 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::setSeed(CEMSeed& seed)
00392 {
00393     seed.setMu(-1.0, 0, 1.0);
00394     seed.setSigma(0.1f, 0.1f, 0.1f);
00395     seed.setWeight(0.33f, 0.34f, 0.33f);
00396     seed.setMinMu(-2, -.05, .25);
00397     seed.setMinSigma(0.02f, 0.02f, 0.02f);
00398     seed.setMaxMu(-.25, .05, 2);
00399     seed.setMaxSigma(.3, .3, .3);
00400 }
00401 
00402 // Find intersection points of given gaussians
00403 std::pair<double, double> CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::findIntersections(double mean1, double mean2, double sigma1, double sigma2)
00404 {
00405     using std::abs;
00406     using std::log;
00407     using std::sqrt;
00408 
00409     const double epsilon = 1.0e-10;
00410 
00411     double intersect1;
00412     double intersect2;
00413 
00414     if (abs(sigma1 - sigma2) < epsilon)
00415     {
00416         intersect1 = intersect2 = 0.5*(mean1 + mean2);
00417     }
00418     else {
00419         double A = sigma1*sigma1 - sigma2*sigma2;
00420         double B = -2.0*(mean2*sigma1*sigma1 - mean1*sigma2*sigma2);
00421         double C = mean2*mean2*sigma1*sigma1 - mean1*mean1*sigma2*sigma2 - 2.0*sigma2*sigma2*sigma1*sigma1*(log(sigma2) - log(sigma1));
00422         intersect1 = (-B - sqrt(B*B - 4.0*A*C))/(2.0*A);
00423         intersect2 = (-B + sqrt(B*B - 4.0*A*C))/(2.0*A);
00424     }
00425     return std::make_pair(intersect1, intersect2);
00426 }
00427 
00428 void CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::countMIE(
00429                                     const std::vector<char>& vIndexGenotypeCalls,
00430                                     const std::vector<char>& vMotherGenotypeCalls,
00431                                     const std::vector<char>& vFatherGenotypeCalls,
00432                                     const std::vector<unsigned char>& vChromosomes
00433                                     )
00434 {
00435     const bool trioCase = !vMotherGenotypeCalls.empty() && !vFatherGenotypeCalls.empty();
00436     const bool duoMat   = !vMotherGenotypeCalls.empty();
00437     const bool duoPat   = !vFatherGenotypeCalls.empty();
00438 
00439     if (trioCase)
00440     {
00441         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vIndexGenotypeCalls.size(); iIndex++)
00442         {
00443             CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00444             if (isMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vMotherGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vFatherGenotypeCalls[iIndex]))
00445             {
00446                 CNCychp::m_mMIE_Trio[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00447             }
00448             if (isMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vMotherGenotypeCalls[iIndex]))
00449             {
00450                 CNCychp::m_mMIE_Mat[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00451             }
00452             if (isMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vFatherGenotypeCalls[iIndex]))
00453             {
00454                 CNCychp::m_mMIE_Pat[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00455             }
00456         }
00457     }
00458     else if (duoMat)
00459     {
00460         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vIndexGenotypeCalls.size(); iIndex++)
00461         {
00462             CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00463             if (isMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vMotherGenotypeCalls[iIndex]))
00464             {
00465                 CNCychp::m_mMIE_Mat[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00466             }
00467         }
00468     }
00469     else if (duoPat)
00470     {
00471         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < vIndexGenotypeCalls.size(); iIndex++)
00472         {
00473             CNCychp::m_mMarkerCount[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00474             if (isMIE(vIndexGenotypeCalls[iIndex], vFatherGenotypeCalls[iIndex]))
00475             {
00476                 CNCychp::m_mMIE_Pat[vChromosomes[iIndex]]++;
00477             }
00478         }
00479     }
00480 }
00481 
00482 inline bool CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::isMIE(char genIndex, char genMother, char genFather)
00483 {
00484     // Mendelian error if either:
00485     //  Mother  Father  Child
00486     //  AA      AA      AB|BB
00487     //  AA      BB      AA|BB
00488     //  AA      AB      BB
00489     //  AB      AA      BB
00490     //  AB      BB      AA
00491     //  BB      AB      AA
00492     //  BB      AA      AA|BB
00493     //  BB      BB      AA|AB
00494     //
00495     return
00496         genMother == 0 && genFather == 0 && (genIndex == 1 || genIndex == 2)  ||
00497         genMother == 0 && genFather == 2 && (genIndex == 0 || genIndex == 2)  ||
00498         genMother == 0 && genFather == 1 && genIndex == 2                     ||
00499         genMother == 1 && genFather == 0 && genIndex == 2                     ||
00500         genMother == 1 && genFather == 2 && genIndex == 0                     ||
00501         genMother == 2 && genFather == 1 && genIndex == 0                     ||
00502         genMother == 2 && genFather == 0 && (genIndex == 0 || genIndex == 2)  ||
00503         genMother == 2 && genFather == 2 && (genIndex == 0 || genIndex == 1);
00504 }
00505 
00506 inline bool CNFamilialAnalysisMethodLOD::isMIE(char genIndex, char genParent)
00507 {
00508     // Mendelian error if either:
00509     //  Parent  Child
00510     //  AA      BB
00511     //  BB      AA
00512     //
00513     return
00514         genParent == 0 && genIndex == 2  ||
00515         genParent == 2 && genIndex == 0;
00516 }
